sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"笨蛋，傻瓜"之意。
means: fool ： 一般指缺乏智力、无判断力和识别能力、头脑糊涂的人。
idiot ： 指智能低、动作迟钝、行为不符合正常的人。

sentence.Network_en: He snubbed her in public and made her feel an idiot.
sentence.Network_cn: 他当众冷落她，让她觉得自己像一个白痴似的。

sentence.Network_en: The original script was written with the idiot box in mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 剧本当初就是为电视而写的。

sentence.Network_en: Custer was an idiot and a brute and he deserved his fate.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡斯特是个白痴，是个残暴的家伙，他罪有应得。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a person of low intelligence): via Old French from Latin idiota 'ignorant person', from Greek idiōtēs 'private person, layman, ignorant person', from idios 'own, private'

entry.def: If you call someone an idiot, you are showing that you think they are very stupid or have done something very stupid.

example.ex: I knew I'd been an idiot to stay there...
example.tran: 我知道我呆在这里很蠢。

example.ex: ...a bunch of idiot journalists waiting to ask me stupid questions.
example.tran: 一帮白痴似的记者等着问我愚蠢的问题

entry.def: In the past, people who had something wrong with their brains that made them seem less intelligent, or different from other people, were sometimes called idiots .

auth_sentence.content: I do not think anyone is an outright idiot.
auth_sentence.res_content: I do not think anyone is an outright idiot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I do not think anyone is an outright idiot.

auth_sentence.content: Not every smart religious person is a 'babbling idiot.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not every smart religious person is a 'babbling idiot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not every smart religious person is a 'babbling idiot.

auth_sentence.content: Even idiot Bush has publicly accepted it, FFS!
auth_sentence.res_content: Even idiot Bush has publicly accepted it, FFS!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even idiot Bush has publicly accepted it, FFS!

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惯用的,合乎语言习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: idiom[n.习语;成语方言;[艺术等的]风格,特色]+atic表形容词→adj.惯用的,合乎语言习惯的
idiot[n.白痴;极蠢的人;笨蛋]+cy表名词→idiocy愚蠢
idio自己的+gloss词语,语言+ia病→自由自己懂,别人不能理解的语言

stems_affixes.value_cn: 个人签名,[组织等的]标记,签名,商标[注意与ideograph区别]
stems_affixes.word_buile: idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+graph写,图→个人写的,个人[或特殊图标]图标→标记,签名,商标
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+lect说→个人说的话

stems_affixes.value_cn: 习语;成语方言;[艺术等的]风格,特色
stems_affixes.word_buile: idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+m→特殊的语言
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+syn共同,综合+crasy状态→个人特殊综合症
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+ot人→idiot特殊的个人→白痴

sentences.en: She always makes a mess of things; she is an idiot!
sentences.cn: 她总是把事情弄糟, 真是个大笨蛋！

sentences.en: You are behaving like a perfect idiot.
sentences.cn: 你表现得像个十足的白痴。

jushi.english: She was an idiot to give up such a good job.
jushi.chinese: 她放弃了这么好的工作,真是个笨蛋。

jushi.english: He was an idiot by birth.
